sub.about:
Switching between kernels might change functionality of your device. 

It might fail to boot!
sub.author: @igorpecovnik

sub.about:
This will open /boot/armbianEnv.txt file to edit
CTRL+S to save
CTLR+X to exit
would you like to continue?

sub.description: Install to internal media, ZFS, NFS, read-only rootfs

sub.prompt: This will enable Armbian read-only filesystem.
sub.author: @igorpecovnik

sub.prompt: This will disable Armbian read-only filesystem.
sub.author: @igorpecovnik

sub.description: Find NFS servers in subnet and mount shares
sub.author: @igorpecovnik
@armbian
sub.condition: ! module_zfs status && linux-version compare "${KERNELID}" le "$(module_zfs kernel_max)"

command: ! pkg_installed libpam-google-authenticator && ! pkg_installed qrencode || pkg_remove libpam-google-authenticator qrencode
sub.author: @igorpecovnik

command:
sed -i $'/KbdInteractiveAuthentication/{iChallengeResponseAuthentication yes
:a;n;ba}' /etc/ssh/sshd_config || sed -n -i '/password updating/{p;:a;N;/@include common-password/!ba;s/.*
/auth required pam_google_authenticator.so nullok
auth required pam_permit.so
/};p' /etc/pam.d/sshd
sub.author: @igorpecovnik
sub.condition: ! pkg_installed libpam-google-authenticator || ! pkg_installed qrencode || grep -q '^ChallengeResponseAuthentication no' /etc/ssh/sshd_config || ! grep -q 'ChallengeResponseAuthentication' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
